title: Riot's unfair placements.
body:
In Season 5, I was placed in Bronze 2, fell to Bronze 5, then climbed up until Silver 4.

This season I won 5 of my placements and am placed in Bronze 4.

How does that even make sense?

replies.body: Got friens who won all ten provisionals and got bronze 5
I went 5-5 and dropped to low plat. I know how you feel.{{item:3070}}

Well there are multiple factors to take in when placing a player in ranks. Your previous MMR, the players you win against and the players you lose against, for example, if you played against golds and won, your elo would go up, but lets say you lost to a bronze 3 or 4, your elo would go down drastically. Another factor is maybe you duo queued, duo queuing can sometimes be unreliable. Heres a website that ma help you http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/League_system. Good luck with your future ranked games!
i know i won 6 and got into Bronze 4
